call_title: CodeUTXO | Marc the Shark & cannon_q | ErgoHack 10

decisions.decision: Apply a 10% markup for SigmaRSV and SigmaUSD tokens, and 20% markup for Quacks and Comet tokens
decisions.speaker: Marc the Shark
decisions.context: Pricing structure for token payments due to swapping costs and volatility
decisions.quote: we apply a 10% markup for tokens. So SigmaRSV, SigmaUSD, and then we do a 20% markup for Quacks, Comet

decisions.decision: Swap all token payments back to ERG following best practices from other projects
decisions.speaker: CannonQ
decisions.context: Need to cover backend costs and manage volatility
decisions.quote: we're swapping it back to ERG. We're taking best practices we've seen from other projects, namely, honestly, Quacks

commitments.commitment: Release SigmaBot with documentation knowledge base to users
commitments.quote: You will not see that today, but you'll see that hopefully in the next week or two

commitments.commitment: Make MCP server tools open source
commitments.quote: the tools are now open source, so if you want to clone the Ergo MCP, the price MCP, feel free to do so

commitments.commitment: Showcase token ID lookup tool development over the next couple of months
commitments.quote: So really want to showcase that over maybe the next couple of months, how easy it is to set that up

open_questions.question: How to set up code to interact with smart contracts on DEXs for trading agents
open_questions.context: Biggest hurdle for implementing trading agents functionality

open_questions.question: How to enable community members to make their own MCP servers and get a revenue cut
open_questions.context: Making the platform a community effort rather than centrally driven

reversals_or_updates.reason: MCP servers are better at hitting APIs and getting data
reversals_or_updates.speaker: CannonQ

key_facts.fact: All users get 0.25 free credits when signing up
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Initial Ergo MCP took about 1 hour to build, Price MCP took 4-6 hours
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Demurrage fee is about 0.14 ERG for a simple box every four years after sitting untouched
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Small token pack costs about 1.1 ERG
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: CodeUTXO plans to apply to other UTXO chains beyond Ergo
